Class
Description

AdministratorDashboardFragment
The following class allows the administrator to see the Dashboard and view all AdministratorEvent, AdministratorProfile and AdministratorImage.
AdministratorEvent
This class defines an event (queried from the database) and is used to store its name and details.
AdministratorEventTest
 
AdministratorImage
This class defines an image (queried from the database) and is used to store it and its name.
AdministratorProfile
This class defines a profile (queried from the database) and is used to store the profile name, image and other details(which will be implemented Part 4).
AdministratorUser
Class for Administrator User
AttendeeActivity
AttendeeActivity manages the main UI for attendee users within the application, providing navigation through a bottom navigation bar to various fragments such as notifications, event scanning, and event details.
AttendeeActivityTest
IMPORTANT!!! comment out the line 80: authenticateUser(this); of AttendeeActivity class otherwise this test will FAIL.
AttendeeEventDetailsFragment
A Fragment representing the event details page for attendees.
AttendeeHomePage
The AttendeeHomePage fragment serves as the main dashboard for attendees upon successful login.
AttendeeNotificationsFragment
A Fragment that displays notifications to the attendee.
AttendeeQRScanner
The AttendeeQRScanner activity provides QR code scanning functionality for attendees.
AttendeeScanFragment
AttendeeScanFragment provides a user interface for attendees to scan QR codes within the event app.
AttendeeUser
 
EditProfileScreenFragment
This is the Edit profile screen fragment that allows the user to update his User info.
EditProfileScreenFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
Interface for implementing onFragmentDestroyed().
EditProfileScreenTest
 
EventArrayAdapter
An ArrayAdapter subclass for displaying a list of AdministratorEvent objects.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
HomeScreenFragment
This is the homescreen fragment that inflates after the User has updated his information on the edit profile page.
ImageArrayAdapter
An ArrayAdapter subclass for displaying a list of AdministratorImage objects.
MainActivity
This Screen allows the user to login either as an Attendee/Organizer/Administrator Depending on what button the user clicks, he is takes to the screen
MainActivityTest
 
Notif
Represents a notification object within the application, specifically for the attendee interface.
NotifArrayAdapter
NotifArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter designed to display notification objects (Notif) within a ListView.
